snippet: Sylvia Mathews Burwell’s experience growing up in West Virginia has helped her navigate the power corridors of Washington, and it explains much about her bipartisan reception in a polarized Capitol.
abstract: Woman in the News; Sylvia Mathews Burwell’s experience growing up in Hinton, W Va, has helped her navigate the power corridors of Washington, and it explains much about her bipartisan reception in a polarized Capitol; new health secretary has maintained ties to her home decades after leaving.
lead_paragraph: Sylvia Mathews Burwell’s experience growing up in West Virginia has helped her navigate the power corridors of Washington, and it explains much about her bipartisan reception in a polarized Capitol.

headline.seo: Sylvia Mathews Burwell Builds Relationships From West Virginia to Washington
headline.main: Newest Cabinet Member Is Never Far From Her Roots
headline.print_headline: Newest Cabinet Member Is Never Far From Her Roots
